QuestData.Title: Grimtotem Chiefs: Grundig Darkcloud
QuestData.Description: One of the infamous Grimtotem leaders of the Stonetalon Mountains has returned home.$B$BWe should take this opportunity to make sure that he doesn't go anywhere else.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Nobility of Darkcloud Pinnacle. His name must end with him.
QuestData.RewardText: <The sentinel gives you an appraising look.>$B$BWhat is it with you? Why do they all seem spooked by you being here?
